name: RadialGradientOptions
description: The type of gradient. Must be 'linear' for linear gradients. */ type?: 'linear'; /** The start point of the gradient. This point defines where the gradient begins. It is represented as a PointData object containing x and y coordinates. The coordinates are in local space by default (0-1), but can be in global space if specified. / start?: PointData; /** The end point of the gradient. This point defines where the gradient ends. It is represented as a PointData object containing x and y coordinates. The coordinates are in local space by default (0-1), but can be in global space if specified. / end?: PointData; } /** Options specific to radial gradients. A radial gradient creates a smooth transition between colors that radiates outward in a circular pattern. The gradient is defined by inner and outer circles, each with their own radius.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of gradient. Must be 'radial' for radial gradients.

properties.name: center
properties.description: The center point of the inner circle where the gradient begins. In local coordinates by default (0-1).

properties.name: innerRadius
properties.description: The radius of the inner circle where the gradient begins.

properties.name: outerCenter
properties.description: The center point of the outer circle where the gradient ends. In local coordinates by default (0-1).

properties.name: outerRadius
properties.description: The radius of the outer circle where the gradient ends.

properties.name: scale
properties.description: The y scale of the gradient, use this to make the gradient elliptical. NOTE: Only applied to radial gradients used with Graphics.

properties.name: rotation
properties.description: The rotation of the gradient in radians, useful for making the gradient elliptical. NOTE: Only applied to radial gradients used with Graphics.

properties.name: emptyColorStops
properties.type: { offset: number, color: string }[] = [{ offset: 0, color: 'white' }, { offset: 1, color: 'black' }]

properties.name: type
properties.type:
'linear',
 *     start: { x: 0, y: 0 },  // Start at top
 *     end: { x: 0, y: 1 },    // End at bottom
 *     colorStops: [
 *         { offset: 0, color: 'red' },   // Red at start
 *         { offset: 1, color: 'blue' }   // Blue at end
 *     ],
 *     // Use normalized coordinate system where (0,0) is the top-left and (1,1) is the bottom-right of the shape
 *     textureSpace: 'local'
 * })

properties.name: type
properties.type:
'radial',
 *     center: { x: 0.5, y: 0.5 },
 *     innerRadius: 0,
 *     outerCenter: { x: 0.5, y: 0.5 },
 *     outerRadius: 0.5,
 *     colorStops: [
 *         { offset: 0, color: 'yellow' }, // Center color
 *         { offset: 1, color: 'green' }   // Edge color
 *     ],
 *     // Use normalized coordinate system where (0,0) is the top-left and (1,1) is the bottom-right of the shape
 *     textureSpace: 'local'
 * })

properties.name: type
properties.type:
'linear',
 *     start: { x: 0, y: 0 },
 *     end: { x: 100, y: 0 },
 *     colorStops: [
 *         { offset: 0, color: 0xff0000 },    // Red
 *         { offset: 0.33, color: 0x00ff00 }, // Green
 *         { offset: 0.66, color: 0x0000ff }, // Blue
 *         { offset: 1, color: 0xff00ff }     // Purple
 *     ],
 *     textureSpace: 'global'  // Use world coordinates
 * })

properties.name: type
properties.type:
'radial',

 *     innerRadius: 0.1,

properties.name: defaultLinearOptions
defaultRadialOptions
properties.type:
RadialGradientOptions = {
        center: { x: 0.5, y: 0.5 },
        innerRadius: 0,
        outerRadius: 0.5,
        colorStops: [],
        scale: 1,
        textureSpace: 'local',
        type: 'radial',
        textureSize: 256,
        wrapMode: 'clamp-to-edge'
    }
